item.title: Change the port of actuator endpoint in a Grails application
item.description: When using actuator endpoints to expose metrics in a Grails (Spring Boot) application, it may be useful to run the metrics on a different port. This enables you to hide the metrics for the public and use the different port in an AWS infrastucture so that the metrics are only available internal.
